text: OK EVERYBODY,
PACK YOUR BAGS….
WE’RE GOING ON A JOURNEY TO OUTER SPACE!
HAHAHA!
THAT’S ONE SMALL STEP FOR MAN….
AWESOME
HEHEHE, HURRAY!

We are the planets, 
“PLANETS”
Living out in space

Each of us is different
Each a glowing face.

We are the planets, 
“PLANETS”
How do you do?

Big Planets, small planets 
Which one are you??

I’m Mercury
Hey, Look at me! I’m closest to the sun

I ain’t got no moon
But I’m faster than everyone, HAHAHA!

We are the planets, 
“PLANETS”
How do you do?

Big Planets, small planets 
Which one are you??

I’m Venus
Also known as Evening Or Morning Star

I’m 7,000 miles away,
That’s really not too far, HEHEHE!

We are the planets, 
“PLANETS”
How do you do?

Big Planets, small planets 
Which one are you??

I’m Earth, You know me best
I’m right beneath your feet

You walk around me everyday
I’m really pretty neat, HAHAHA!

We are the planets, 
“PLANETS”
How do you do?

Big Planets, small planets 
Which one are you??

I’m Mars, Man I’m red
Craters from head to toe

I’m covered in Volcanoes
I hope they never BLOWWWWW! HAHA!

We are the planets, 
“PLANETS”
How do you do?

Big Planets, small planets 
Which one are you??

I’m Jupiter, the biggest one
And Stronger than them all

I’m made of gas, and if they ask
Say I’m havin a ball! HAHA

We are the planets, 
“PLANETS”
How do you do?

Big Planets, small planets 
Which one are you??

I’m Saturn, hey look at these
Do you like my rings?

You can see me through a telescope
If you like that sorta thing. HAHAHA

We are the planets, 
“PLANETS”
How do you do?

Big Planets, small planets 
Which one are you??

I’m Uranus, wow what a view!
I’m a planet, just like you

I’m a pretty shade of blue
Check your books, it’s all truuuuue!

We are the planets, 
“PLANETS”
How do you do?

Big Planets, small planets 
Which one are you??

I’m Neptune, 
And might I add, I’m furthest from the sun

I’m also blue and gassy too
I guess that makes me just like YOU!

We are the planets, 
“PLANETS”
How do you do?

Big Planets, small planets 
Which one are you??

We are the planets, 
“PLANETS”
How do you do?

Big Planets, small planets 
NOW WE KNOW ALL OF YOU!!!
